attributes.title: Grandma i’m sorry.
attributes.review:
My Grandma told me not to download the app. And of course me being myself I didn’t listen. I had to see what she was hiding from me. Had to see what the hype was about. I was ready to be mind blown but no that wasn’t what i got. Instead I was greeted not greeted harassed by the first thing I see when i open the app. A long smelly foot cheeto man. i wasn’t warned and it makes me sad. my grandma saw it too and heart attack. She died in the hospital later that day. RIP Grandma!!!
Fly High🕊

attributes.title: The most horrible up in the whole world
attributes.review: I can’t believe people actually support even though he brings the hate in this world and is a racist man who doesn’t deserve nothing like him his wife doesn’t like him and especially the queen as you can tell by the photo the queen was more happy with Obama As you can tell Obama was a better president even though Obama can’t be president again Think everybody should vote for Obama’s wife who should be president

attributes.title: oh my eyes.
attributes.review: i don’t even know where to start with this thing. like  this app is literally ran by a cheeto! what kinda joke is this?! the opening says “make america great again.” but this cheeto has been trying to do this for 4 years and has only made it worst!! i don’t know what to tell you but the pictures posting on this disturbing app made my eyes bleed! like i should sue for this because it made my fish explode! y’all owe me a new life saving because now my house is on fire because my phone didn’t want to take the disgust anymore!!! i’m literally writing this on a pencil sharpener because my phone exploded causing my house to burn down! if i could give this a no star review i would! i’m suing this and for all it’s worth.

attributes.title: I Tried To Like The App
attributes.review:
Tried to like the app but it’s just terrible. Nothing works. For some reason after downloading it affects the device used in downloading. And now my phone has a lot of glitches, other apps have been affected. 

I realized lots of people also experience this issue. I just hope this app isn’t stealing info from my phone because that won’t be great.

Is there a solution to this problem?????????

attributes.title: Worst App Ever 🤢🤮
attributes.review: This app is pure unusable, and for something made by the government, it just doesn’t make any sense. When I downloaded this app, there was so many lizards just popping on for no good reason. Also the fact that when I was finally able to make the app work after two hours of waiting, it crashes on me. This app is so bad, don’t even think about using it. If you need the news, just use Google.

attributes.title: be warned: this is may cause physical discomfort to anyone with decent morals
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to show my respect for lil bunker boy but was horrified at how awful it turned out. aside from the racist/homophobic/transphobic/xenophobic/sexist rhetoric that is spewed, i found the the app was very slow and glitchy. unfortunately i finally had enough and decided to delete it as soon as i discovered that the app had changed my lock screen to an image of an unfortunately overweight man with what appeared to be a cheeto in his nether regions. i was quite traumatized from my experience and feel that this app needs to undergo some serious changes or better yet be removed from the app store. thank you for your time but pls do not download this garbage app.

attributes.title: Phone
attributes.review: This app the second I got it. It ruined all of my other apps with its presence. It literally broke my phone. All my phone would do is the screen would turn orange and a american trump 2020 flag would show up on both lock and home screens and then all my pictures would be replaced with Trump 2020 flags I hate this app and it needs to be shut down. The only way I am writing this review is on my old phone that’s I don’t use. 🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: Ewwie 😾 offensive thing on the cover of loading screen 🧚
attributes.review: I find this app very very offensive due to the fact I was shown a Cheeto colored man acting in such an immature state. I believe he is a racist and makes incompetent jokes about other various races not including being caucasian. I really don’t understand why people support such a man if he acts like a child, very disgusted. The app itself was very very slow and tend to glitch a lot. Do not get this app it is a waste of time.

attributes.title: This is a HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I don’t recommend this app when i first opened it the app you are slap by a narcissist  bunker baby and is falsely advertising statements a statement that educated people know of. As I went throw the app the app was cause me to throw up multiple times. I don’t recommend it they also have bad customer service they never read through my complains of the app. Just a horrible app I couldn’t think of better word to describe this just horrible!!

attributes.title: this app is absolutely HORRIBLE
attributes.review: i signed up to receive calls from the idiot himself and when i opened it up there was a giant green dinosaur on the front page. dinosaurs TRIGGER me, i remember having dreams every night where they would pull out huge wooden stixks and beat the crap out of donald with them- oh wait. those werent the nightmares. anyways i hate this app so much, the colors offend me and the guy on the front looks like a stupid orange- im ALLERGIC to oranges. please dont download this monstrosity
